game.title: PHOGS!
game.description: PHOGS! takes you and a friend on a vibrant, cartoony adventure as a double-ended dog. Stretch your co-op abilities as you learn to work together, sharing a controller and a body in a bizarre and puzzling world!
game.history: PHOGS! is the first game we are developing as Bit Loom. Currently being developed for PC and Consoles at Biome Collective in Dundee, it aims to be a short experience filled with strange puzzles, creatures and interactions. It has been showcased at various events including Insomnia61, EGX 2017 and IndieCade 2017.

features.feature: Share a controller with your friend.
Meet strange creatures and solve bizarre puzzles!

award.description: Named in the top games on the show floor at EGX 2017 by EuroGamer and The Guardian.

quote.description: What the industry needs right now is more co-op games about two-headed dogs.
quote.name: Jordan Erica Webber and Keith Stuart

quote.description: It is somehow cute and disgusting at the same time.
quote.name: Brendan Caldwell

quote.description: Great ideas and buckets of charm.
quote.name: Matthew Reynolds

quote.description: It perfectly captures that cheerful, colourful spirit of gaming which is normally left exclusively to the chipper halls of Nintendo, or Rare.
quote.name: Dann Sullivan
